name: HumanOrigin: Liu Lanzhi
description:
Human beings are not the original species of the earth. Millions of years ago, human beings came to the earth from the space ......

A traditional RPG game with multiple endings story.

The plot is adapted from China's oldest long narrative poem, love and hatred through millions of years, and the more wonderful branch story than the main story , are all inspired by Chinese classical literature and ancient history.

Sword, axe, dagger, shield, bow, spear, staff and other weapon types, each weapon has a different attack mode. There are many other equipments in the game too .And there are also quest, shop ,inventory, treasure chests, skills, pets, craft, mount and other systems.

I personally allow the streamer to broadcast my game live
